name: Rotate Defender
description:
Rotate Defender is a simple high score game reminiscent of the good old arcade Shoot 'em Ups, but with a unique spin on it. Manipulate enemy ships to hit their weak spots all while doging their damaging bullets.

This game was created within 48 hours for the Kenney Jam 2021 - Theme: Rotation

The following asset packs were used:

Simple Space
Space Shooter Redux
Space Shooter Extension
1-Bit Platformer Pack
Crosshair Pack
UI Pack: Space Expansion
Game Icons
Game Icons (expansion)
Kenney Fonts

>> Art assets made by Kenney (https://kenney.nl)

>> Music by Chris Zabriskie (http://chriszabriskie.com)
